casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Thomas SAMARGI, Appellant. No. 209. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 3, 1941. Bertram G. Eadie, of St. George, S. I., N. Y. (Thomas Nunley, of St. George, S. I., N. Y., on the brief), for appellant. Harold M. Kennedy, U. S. Atty., and Vine H. Smith, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment ■ affirmed.
